articles.author: Lynn Butler
articles.title: Faf hopes SA20 helps restore public faith in local cricket amid 'dark times'
articles.description: Former Proteas captain Faf du Plessis hopes that the inaugural SA20 will restore the South African public's faith in local cricket.
articles.content:
• Former Proteas captain Faf du Plessis hopes the inaugural SA20 will restore the public's interest in cricket.
  • This comes after the Proteas were hammered by Australia in the three-matc… [+3574 chars]

articles.title: "Distressing Images Of Injured Cricketer": Warning For TV Channels On Content
articles.description: The government on Monday termed the television news coverage of cricketer Rishabh Pant's road accident and some other crime stories "distasteful" and "heart-wrenching".
articles.content:
The ministry has "strongly advised" television channels to attune their systems.
New Delhi: The government on Monday termed the television news coverage of cricketer Rishabh Pant's road accident and… [+1676 chars]

articles.author: Simon Smale
articles.title: Australia's lopsided summer of cricket, beating South Africa and West Indies, unlikely to be an outlier
articles.description: Australia's summer of cricket was dramatically lopsided, but looking at where both Australia and South Africa go next, there is a concern that mismatches will become the norm.
articles.content:
You'll be hard pushed to find anyone who will come away from the summer of cricket with much positivity.
Sure, Australia were excellent.
Steve Smith, Marnus Labuschagne, David Warner, Usman Khawaja… [+6227 chars]

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
